程序包 org.tron.trident.core.contract

类 Trc20Contract

java.lang.Object
org.tron.trident.core.contract.Contract
org.tron.trident.core.contract.Trc20Contract
public class Trc20Contract extends Contract
The Trc20Contract is a wrapper class of a standard TRC-20 smart contract.

A Trc20Contract object includes standard TRC-20 functions defined in TIP-20. Each Trc20Contract binds a ApiWrapper with specific caller's private key and address.

从以下版本开始:
jdk 1.8.0_231
另请参阅:

  • Function

  • 方法详细资料

    • name

      public String name()
      Call function name() public view returns (string). Returns the name of the token - e.g. "MyToken".
      返回:
      the name of the token

    • symbol

      public String symbol()
      Call function symbol() public view returns (string). Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX".
      返回:
      the symbol of the token

    • decimals

      public BigInteger decimals()
      Call function decimals() public view returns (uint8). Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation
      返回:
      the number of decimals the token uses

    • totalSupply

      public BigInteger totalSupply()
      Call function totalSupply() public view returns (uint256). Returns the total token supply.
      返回:
      the total token supply

    • balanceOf

      public BigInteger balanceOf(String accountAddr)
      Call function balanceOf(address _owner) public view returns (uint256 balance). Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
      参数:
      accountAddr - The token owner's address
      callerAddr - The caller's address
      cntrAddr - The contract's address
      返回:
      the account balance of another account with address _owner

    • transfer

      public String transfer(String destAddr, long amount, int power, String memo, long feeLimit)
      Call function transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success). Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to.
      参数:
      destAddr - The address to receive the token
      amount - The transfer amount
      power - The power number of 10 that the transfer amount multiplied by
      memo - The transaction memo
      feeLimit - The energy fee limit
      返回:
      Transaction hash

    • transferFrom

      public String transferFrom(String fromAddr, String destAddr, long amount, int power, String memo, long feeLimit)
      call function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) The transferFrom method is used for a withdraw workflow, allowing contracts to transfer tokens on your behalf. This can only be called when someone has allowed you some amount.
      参数:
      fromAddr - The address who sends tokens (or the address to withdraw from)
      destAddr - The address to receive the token
      amount - The transfer amount
      power - The power number of 10 that the transfer amount multiplied by
      memo - The transaction memo
      feeLimit - The energy fee limit
      返回:
      Transaction hash

    • approve

      public String approve(String spender, long amount, int power, String memo, long feeLimit)
      Call function approve(address _spender, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
      参数:
      spender - The address who is allowed to withdraw.
      amount - The amount allowed to withdraw.
      power - The power number of 10 that the transfer amount multiplied by
      memo - The transaction memo
      feeLimit - The energy fee limit
      返回:
      Transaction hash

    • allowance

      public BigInteger allowance(String owner, String spender)
      Call function allowance(address _owner, address _spender) public view returns (uint256 remaining). Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
      参数:
      owner - The address to be withdrew from.
      spender - The address of the withdrawer.
      callerAddr - The caller's address
      cntrAddr - The contract's address
      返回:
      the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner
